DOC.detailed_description: Islet quality control pancreatic islet isolation process insufficient . The Islet Chip study proposes develop bio-sensor allow multi-parametric analysis islet graft base measurement islet membrane electric potential . The project aim : - develop bio-sensor necessary measure islet membrane electric potential - develop interface bio-sensor user - correlate analysis data collect bio-sensor metabolic result islet graft
